title: SEO Keyword Planner
description: Fetch, expand and enrich keywords using Google Ads API. Generates detailed keyword metrics including search volumes and trends, CPC, competition data etc.

keywords.title: Seed Keywords
keywords.description:
The (initial) keywords to fetch data for. These keywords will be used to generate related keyword suggestions (if ideas is True) with search volume and competition data.

**Important Limitations:**
• Maximum 20 keywords for keyword idea generation (when `ideas` is enabled)
• No limit for basic keyword analysis (when `ideas` is disabled)
• If more than 20 keywords are provided with `ideas` enabled, idea generation will be automatically disabled

**Tips:**
• Use 2-5 seed keywords for best results with idea generation
• Include both broad and specific terms
• Use keywords relevant to your niche
• Avoid very generic terms (e.g., 'marketing' alone)

**Examples:**
• ['seo', 'search engine optimization', 'organic traffic']
• ['digital marketing', 'social media marketing', 'content marketing']
• ['web development', 'react developer', 'javascript programming']

**Note:** Either keywords or page (or both) must be provided.

url.title: Page URL
url.description: The page to fetch data for (if applicable).

whole_site.title: Whole Site
whole_site.description: Whether to fetch keyword ideas for the whole site (if url is provided).

max_ideas.title: Maximum Keyword Ideas
max_ideas.description:
Maximum number of additional keyword ideas to fetch (if ideas is True). This limits the number of related keywords returned based on the seed keywords.

**Important:**
• Only effective when `ideas` is enabled and you have 20 or fewer seed keywords
• If `ideas` is disabled, this setting has no effect
• If more than 20 seed keywords are provided, idea generation is automatically disabled
• Recommended range: 100-1000 ideas for balanced results and processing time

language.title: Language Code
language.description: The language to use for keyword data (e.g., ‘en’ for English). Leave empty to include all languages.

country.title: Target Country
country.description: The geographical target for keyword data (e.g., ‘us’ for United States). Leave empty to not filter geographically.

metrics_start.title: Metrics Start Date
metrics_start.description:
Start date (year and month) for metrics in YYYY-MM format (e.g., ‘2023-01’). This determines the beginning of the historical search volume data range.

**Important Limitations:**
• Google Ads API typically provides data for the last 2 years only
• Dates older than 2 years may result in errors
• Must be before the end date
• Cannot be in the future

**Examples:**
• 2024-07 (July 2024)
• 2023-12 (December 2023)
• 2024-01 (January 2024)

**Recommended:** Use recent dates within the last 12-24 months for best data availability.

metrics_end.title: Metrics End Date
metrics_end.description:
End date (year and month) for metrics in YYYY-MM format (e.g., ‘2023-12’). This determines the end of the historical search volume data range.

**Important Limitations:**
• Cannot be in the future
• Must be after the start date
• Maximum 2-year range from start date
• Should not exceed current month

**Examples:**
• 2025-07 (July 2025)
• 2024-12 (December 2024)
• 2025-01 (January 2025)

**Tip:** For most current data, use the current month or the previous month as the end date.
